Posts.Content: On Mar 05, 2009 12:00 AM jakes wrote: I have just had a lumpectomy and gotten pathology report stating ACC, I am scheduled to see an oncologist in two weeks, I would appreciate any information, this is a shock for me plus it is sooo rare. thanks I have undergone amstectomy of my right breast for ACC. My immunochemistry report shows does not have node positive disease meaning the lymph nodes are negative for cancer.    The ER (estrogen receptor) and PR (progesterone receptor) positive and Her2neu negative. There has not been any lymphovascular invation. is there any need for me to go in for chemotherapy? Please guide me - Sudha
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast
